New Records: Florian Wirtz scored the fastest goal in 7.2 seconds, almost matching Lukas Podolski's record from 2013.
Key Match Events: Kai Havertz scored the second goal for Germany.
Pre-Game Insights: Both teams are preparing for the European Championship this summer.
Post-Match Reflections: France's coach made several changes during the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a significant preparation step for both teams ahead of the tournament.
